item.title: Intro Talk - Data Science in business
item.description: Use the tabs to access content This Video series contains a 3-part talk by Daniel and Roman on data science applications in business Follow along: Slides DS in business 1 - Current state 2 - Intro ML 3 - DS Teams Data Science in business 1 - Current state Data Science in business 2 - Introduction to Machine Learning Data Science in business 3 -Team and Roles

item.title: The Data Science Ecosystem
item.description: Use the tabs to access content This Video series contains an introduction to the data science ecosystem, includng a general as well as a R and Python specific overview. R Ecosystem Python Ecosystem DS Ecosystem general Video Slides Video Slides Video Slides
